__e: You both wanted me to stay out of it, and I did.
I know we left because you guys wanted me to have a normal life.
- So you don't wish that I was younger when you met me? - No.
I received your message, James, that you were home and wanted to see me.
So, when you wanted to see me, I just couldn't say no.
Was there anything in particular you wanted to see me about?
Man downstairs said you had something to tell me.
But your agents didn't say what you wanted to talk about.
I mean, is that why you wanted to talk to me?
You wanted to see what I would do with it.
I told Lucy you were just seeing who's taller.
That's what you wanted to see, right, huh?
For six years, I did all the work that you didn't want to do.
I know that you and my father weren't trying to hurt anyone.
Strange like you not telling me what you were really up to that day?
- Look, I gave you what you want.
You wanna know who and what I am?
Can you just... Put that thing away.
